basics.label: Engineering Intern
basics.summary: Proficient Entry Level Electrical Engineer with excellent technical, analytical and communication skills. Willing to relocate anywhere in the US.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Conducted a successful research project on innovative use of Active Noise Control (ANC), 3-D Noise Mapping and Passive Noise Control systems as a solution for acoustical noise control issues in fast growing cities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Successfully engineered a new transmission line to feed a new load in a city's transmission system using PowerWorld simulation software, and ETAP.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Lead AutoCAD Drafting team of 3 in drafting 2D maps of Oil and Gas production sites. Enhanced my communication and leadership skills within my team and my manager.

awards.title: Rwanda Presidential Scholarship
awards.summary: Recognized as one of the top ten students nationally (based on academic merit) to receive a 4-year full ride scholarship at Oklahoma Christian University.

projects.name: IEEE Robot Competition Systems Design (CAPSTONE)
projects.description: Collaborated with a team of 4 engineering students in the design and implementation of an autonomous robot that has to detect an oil rig on 'fire', select and transport a specific tool in order to extinguish the fire.
highlights: Lead the mechanical design of the robot; both chassis and robotic arm parts with 3-D printing technology and SolidWorks software.

projects.name: Spectrum Analyzer Real Time Signal Processing
projects.description: Programmed a C6713 DSK board and implemented a digital Spectrum Analyzer.
highlights: Used the Software development lifecycle to develop the software of the system.
Built the UI using Visual Basics.NET.

projects.name: Guitar Tuner Digital Signal Processing
projects.description: Engineered a guitar tuner implemented by programming a C6713 DSK board.
highlights: Designed analog filters and digital filters to remove noise in an audio file using algorithms developed with Matlab and Simulink.

projects.name: Laser Project Computer Systems
projects.description: Created a compact computer system that controls and animates letters on a wall.
highlights: Implemented the hardware schematics developed in assembly language on a MC68HC11 microprocessor.
